/>
II.ii.2.C.3.b
.
Removal of Material From Paper Claims Folders
Follow the steps in the table below to remove material from the paper claims folder.
Step
Action
1
Remove material contained in paper claims folders that is redundant or of no record value.
2
Dispose of the removed material under
RCS VB-1, Part I
.
Note
:  There is no longer a requirement to return documents to the claimant.
title: M21-1, Part II, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section C - Locked Files Folder Maintenance
citation: Part II, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section C
